nodes.text: Hachinka was a female New Republic soldier who served as a squad leader in the New Republic Thirty-First during the Galactic Civil War in 5 ABY. During the Battle of Nag Ubdur, she was shot in the neck by an Imperial blaster. Her squad, which included Private Rorith Khadur, managed to evacuate her to safety.
Hachinka was mentioned in the 2016 novel Aftermath: Life Debt, written by Chuck Wendig.
